column1: 4 Packed Charts The packed charts perform a number of roles: they are a compact representation of a very large number of CCG derivations; they allow recovery of the highest scoring parse or dependency structure without enumerating all derivations; and they represent an instance of what CITATION call a feature forest
column2: which is used to efficiently estimate a log-linear model.
